Title: Monster
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Chris Rafferty, Jenn Kao (executive story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)

Plot: Lucifer clashes with Chloe during an investigation, leading her to partner with Dan.
